title: What are some hostels or PGs near Amity University, Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don’t worry !! There are lots of PGs nearby Amity.Rates are varied according to the locality,single sharing or double sharing, AC and Non Ac rooms. Nearest PG to Amity are in sector 126 Raipur village which is nearby to gate no 2 ,hardly 5–10 minutes walking distance.You will find lots of PGs in this area in an affordable prices.Its a village area so if you are okii with that can go have look there.And one more thing Restrictions will be there in all PG’s you can not bring your GF. If you don’t like this rule then better go for a flat in Amarpali and sector 37 Arun vihar area. 4–5 guys can take a flat in sharing. Different categories of room you can find are following:- Room rent— 3500- 3800 per month + Security money (2 MONTHS) without AC sharing room (2 persons in one room) Drinking water Study table chair Room rent— 6000- 10000 per month + Security money (2 MONTHS) AC rooms (sharing) Drinking water study table Wifi Chair Sector 44 society PGs (For girls ) Next choice of PG’s if you don’t like the rooms or areas are in sector 44 which is is just 1–2 km distance from Amity gate no-4 .Most of the girls and there parents don’t like the area of sector 125 Raipur. If this is the case then in sector 44 society girls can find PG’s , you have to pay around 10000–12000 rs per month + security money (2 months) ,food is also included in this. Sector 44 Chalera village You can find cheap rent PG’s in this area. Sector 44 is just 1–2 km far away from Amity gate no 4. Room rent will be around 3000–4000 rs per month in this area with all basic facilities. FLATS If you don’t like the restrictions and you are party guy , and you have a Girlfriend then you can search flats in the following areas.Just contact with some broker he will ask one months rent as his fees ,don’t forget to negotiate with him. Amarpali Sector 44 Sector 37 Arun vihar near botanical garden metro station. Good luck!!
